ai-tha-ap554:1.3_0: wandering for alms in the forest,
ai-tha-ap554:2.1_0: Through that deed of deed, (something) deed,
ai-tha-ap554:2.2_0: for the sake of the world’s enjoying the benefit of the world.
ai-tha-ap554:2.4_0: having left victory and defeat behind.
ai-tha-ap554:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap554:3.4_0: as the best gift is the best of gifts.
ai-tha-ap554:5.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap554:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nandaka.
ai-tha-ap554:8.1_0: to the Elder Nadī Kassapa’s Mother,
